title: Swap & Share Bookshelf
description: (in development) A community-driven book exchange platform that enables users to seamlessly swap books, discover new reads, and connect with fellow readers while promoting sustainable reading habits.

title: Team Fitness Android Application
description: A comprehensive fitness tracking application designed to provide reports and analytics on user performance trends, goal achievements, and progress over time.

title: Driveway Sealing Business Web Application
description: This database application for a driveway-sealing contractor is designed to streamline client management.

title: Cafe Store Interface Android Application
description: A user-friendly mobile application that enhances the cafe experience by allowing users to view menus, place orders, and view their cart.
